articles.author: Tyler McCarthy
articles.title: Tom Hanks' son brushes off cultural appropriation claims after speaking Jamaican patois at the Golden Globes
articles.description: Tom Hanks’ son Chet is brushing off criticism after releasing a video of himself speaking Jamaican patois on the red carpet of the Golden Globe Awards.
articles.content:
Tom Hanks’ son Chet is brushing off criticism after releasing a video of himself speaking Jamaican patois on the red carpet of the Golden Globe Awards.

articles.title: Naomi Osaka wins 1st-round match at Brisbane International
articles.description: Naomi Osaka got an extended workout in her opening match at the Brisbane International, just two weeks away from the defense of her Australia Open title.
articles.content:
Naomi Osaka got an extended workout in her opening match at the Brisbane International, just two weeks away from the defense of her Australia Open title.
Osaka defeated Greece's Maria Sakkari 6-2, 6-7 (4), 6-3 on Tuesday to set up a second-round match with A… [+912 chars]

articles.title: Tom Homan says birth tourism, birthright citizenship are 'huge' immigration issues
articles.description: Birth tourism and birthright citizenship -- factors creating incentives for "anchor babies" in the United States -- are huge drivers for illegal immigration, former acting ICE director Tom Homan said Tuesday.
articles.content:
Birth tourism and birthright citizenship are huge drivers for illegal immigration, former acting U.S. Customs and Immigration Enforcement (ICE) director Tom Homan said Tuesday.

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Embiid, with dislocated finger, leads 76ers past Thunder
articles.description: Joel Embiid's left ring finger looked like the top of a used bendy drinking straw, grotesquely overlapping his pinkie to the point that it seemed he had his fingers crossed.
articles.content:
Joel Embiid's left ring finger looked like the top of a used bendy drinking straw, grotesquely overlapping his pinkie to the point that it seemed he had his fingers crossed.
“I nearly threw up when I saw that,” 76ers guard Ben Simmons said.

articles.title: Nashville Predators fire coach Peter Laviolette
articles.description: With the Predators struggling to keep pace in the playoff chase, he fired coach Peter Laviolette on Monday despite winning a Presidents' Trophy and back-to-back Central Division titles.

articles.title: Reds agree to $21 million, 3-year deal with OF Shogo Akiyama
articles.description: Outfielder Shogo Akiyama agreed to a $21 million, three-year deal with the Cincinnati Reds, the only major league team that hasn't had a player born in Japan.
articles.content:

articles.title: Newt Gingrich: In 2020, Abraham Lincoln will be controversial and divisive. (Yes, Lincoln!) Here's why
